title: Definitions
context: PART VII. INDUSTRIAL PARKS ยง171-131 Definitions. For the purposes of this part: &ldquo;Eligible lessee&rdquo; means a person who is: (1) Engaged or proposing to engage in an industrial use; and (2) Qualified to lease public lands under this chapter. &ldquo;Industrial park&rdquo; means an area of public lands which is designated an industrial park in accordance with this part. &ldquo;Industrial use&rdquo; means the manufacturing, refining, sorting, processing, storing, maintaining, or repairing of materials, substances, products, or equipment. &ldquo;Infrastructure&rdquo; includes water, drainage, sewer, waste disposal, and waste treatment systems, roads, and street lighting. [L 1988, c 361, pt of ยง1; am L 1991, c 173, ยง1]
